action.action-desc: Mr. Higgins of Louisiana introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To amend Public Law 110–457 to modify the provision relating to unique passport identifiers for covered sex offenders.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the International Megan’s Law Improvement Act of 2022.

section.header: Modification of provision relating to unique passport identifiers for covered sex offenders
section.text: Section 240(c)(1)(B) of Public Law 110–457 (22 U.S.C. 212b(c)(1)(B)) is amended by adding at the end before the semicolon the following: or has an existing requirement prior to relocating to another country of residence that would require re-registration under the sex offender registration program of any jurisdiction upon return to that jurisdiction.
